title: Appendix: Provider Detail - {provider}
ip_text: Quoted ${ip_mrc}/Mbps up to {bandwidth} Mbps. Burstable at a rate of ${burstrate}/Mbps
xc_text: Cross Connects are available at a rate of ${xc_mrc}/unit, with a total NRC of ${xc_nrc}
rh_text: Remote Hands Services are available at a rate of ${rh_business} during business hours and ${rh_offbusiness} otherwise
cc_text: Offered Cloud Connect services at {cc_bandwidth}Mbps. Quoted Azure at ${azure_mrc} and AWS at ${aws_mrc}. NRCs of ${azure_nrc} and ${aws_nrc} respectively
